snippet: After a rate-rigging scandal, Barclays has appointed Hector Sants, a former chief of Britain’s Financial Services Authority, as its head of compliance.
abstract: After a rate-rigging scandal, Barclays has appointed Hector Sants, a former chief of Britain’s Financial Services Authority, as its head of compliance.

headline.main: Barclays Names Former British Regulator as Head of Compliance
